mapper.update:
update
E_BS_INF_DLT
E_ACCT_INF_DEL
E_ACCT_INF_ENT_DEL
E_CTRCT_INF_DEL
E_CTRCT_INF_ENT_DEL
E_SEC_ACCT_DEL
E_SEC_ACCT_ENT_DEL

E_IN_OUT_ENT_DEL

EAZ_EN_BS_INF_DLT_ID
EDY_EN_ACCT_INF_DEL_ID
EDZ_EN_ACCT_INF_ENT_DEL_ID
EGY_EN_CTRCT_INF_DEL_ID

E_CASH_FLOW_ENT_DEL_ID
E_ASSETS_DEBT_ENT_DEL_ID

E_BS_INF_DLT
E_ACCT_INF_DEL
E_ACCT_INF_ENT_DEL
E_CTRCT_INF_DEL
E_CTRCT_INF_ENT_DEL

where REPORT_MESSAGE_ID = #{reportMessageId} and company = #{COMPANY}
